bio: I am Lyra,  a Wild Elf, a descendant of Ayleid refugees to Valenwood, and Bosmer. I am a Battle-Bard who is passionate about songs, stories, music, and Shouting. I am a wandering skald and can be found at various inns each day. I am married to The Nightingale’s Song and my horse’s name is Alasil, which means “vision” in Ayleid language.
name: Lyra Nightingale
notes: Shawn - Still Anna Castiglioni voice acted, but different enough performance that FemaleElfHaughty has been assigned
